import{INCREMENT}from'../type/type';//2-create reducer to set state and change it
export const reducerCounter=function(){let state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{counter:1};let action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;if(action.type===INCREMENT){return{counter:state.counter+1};}if(action.type==="DECERMENT"){return{counter:state.counter-1};}if(action.type==="RESET"){return{counter:0};}return state;};
